name: Super Sleep Helper 5000
description:
SUPER SLEEP HELPER 5000

FALL ASLEEP IN NO TIME AT ALL WITH OUR HIGH-TECH SHEEP COUNTING SIMULATION

Instructions
CLICK on the sheep to gain points. 
DON'T click on the black sheep
DON'T let the sheep get through unclicked
You have THREE lives, after that, it's game over!
The more points you get, the sleepier you'll become...

Created by:

Falu (Sprites), Fandemic (Game development), Polopenzo (Game development), Rowan Evans (Music), Ziprasidone (Background Art)

Made for My First Game Jam
